:py:mod:`structural_analysis.section`
=====================================

.. py:module:: structural_analysis.section

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Classes:
       Section
       Circle
       Rectangle
       ArbitrarySection

   Section class is an abstract class.
   Other classes are derived from Section.



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   structural_analysis.section.Section
   structural_analysis.section.Circle
   structural_analysis.section.Rectangle
   structural_analysis.section.ArbitrarySection




.. py:class:: Section

   An abstract class to represent a section which will be assigned to element objects.
   ...

   .. py:method:: area(self)
      :property:

      area of the cross-section


   .. py:method:: inertia_y(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element y-axis


   .. py:method:: inertia_z(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element z-axis


   .. py:method:: polar_inertia(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element x-axis


   .. py:method:: warping_rigidity(self)
      :property:

      warping rigidity of the cross-section



.. py:class:: Circle(radius)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Section`

   A class to represent a circular section which will be assigned to element objects.
   ...

   .. py:method:: area(self)
      :property:

      area of the cross-section


   .. py:method:: inertia_y(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element y-axis


   .. py:method:: inertia_z(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element z-axis


   .. py:method:: polar_inertia(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element x-axis


   .. py:method:: warping_rigidity(self)
      :property:

      zero for circular cross-sections



.. py:class:: Rectangle(breadth, depth)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Section`

   A class to represent a rectangular section which will be assigned to element objects.
   ...

   .. py:method:: area(self)
      :property:

      area of the cross-section


   .. py:method:: inertia_y(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element y-axis


   .. py:method:: inertia_z(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element z-axis


   .. py:method:: polar_inertia(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element x-axis


   .. py:method:: warping_rigidity(self)
      :property:

      warping rigidity of the cross-section



.. py:class:: ArbitrarySection(area, inertia_y, inertia_z, polar_inertia, warping_rigidity=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Section`

   A class to represent an arbitrary shaped section with user-defined geometric properties
   which will be assigned to element objects.
   ...

   .. py:method:: area(self)
      :property:

      area of the cross-section


   .. py:method:: inertia_y(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element y-axis


   .. py:method:: inertia_z(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element z-axis


   .. py:method:: polar_inertia(self)
      :property:

      inertia of the cross-section around the element x-axis


   .. py:method:: warping_rigidity(self)
      :property:

      warping rigidity of the cross-section
